title: London 2012 & SCD
content:
Hi,

I have two questions,

1. Does anybody know the name of the font used in the london 2012 logo and how I could purchase it?

2. What is the name of the font used in strictly come dancing (scd)for an example go to: [http://www.bbc.co.uk/strictlycomedancing](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/www.bbc.co.uk/strictlycomedancing "http://www.bbc.co.uk/strictlycomedancing")

Many Thanks,

ostorey

 [‹ Expertise font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/typophile.com/node/50432 "Go to previous forum topic") [Help with this italic font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/typophile.com/node/50419 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ostorey

comments.content:
Hi Oliver,

re 1: [London 2012 font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/typophile.com/node/34381). I don’t think it’s publicly available.  
re 2: Here’s an image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s_4930.png)
  
[edit] Seems to be (based on) [Adine Kirnberg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/a/adine.htm).

F

The typeface used for the London 2012 logo is custom. More info here:

[http://www.wolffolins.com/london2012.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20081017120950/http:/www.wolffolins.com/london2012.php "http://www.wolffolins.com/london2012.php")

Thanks for the help guys!

So the Strictly Come Dancing logo is an edit of the font Adine Kirnberg?

Thanks,

ostorey
